name: Forgotten Persona #3
description:
Animated GIF | 8 fps| 2048 x 2048 | RGB | sRGB IEC61966-2.1

This is a memory of a photo I might have seen somewhere in my childhood. Or maybe it's just an imagination I had as a child. It's a gentle but chilling feeling when I start drawing and awaken the ghosts of a forgotten memory.

By drawing all four images of the woman at the same time, frame by frame, I don't even know what the woman will look like. Just as all of these four portraits of women are unique and different, my memory is also always shifting. 

This is exactly what I am trying to illustrate. The imperfection of human reproducibility and memory, captured in a GIF of eight images.
